code: import{Player}from"./Player";import{Position}from"../enums/Position";export class DragAndDropPlayer extends Player{constructor(player){super(player.getName(),player.getPlayerType(),player.getCurrentPosition());this.source=void 0;this.setNumber(player.getNumber());this.setPlayerLink(player.getPlayerLink());this.setOnCourt(player.isOnCourt());this.setServing(player.isServing());}getSource(){return this.source;}setSource(source){this.source=source;}toString(){return JSON.stringify(this);}static revive(playerToRevive){let revivedPlayer=new DragAndDropPlayer(this.reviveRecursive(playerToRevive,false));revivedPlayer.setSource(playerToRevive.getSource());return revivedPlayer;}static reviveRecursive(playerToRevive,isPlayerLink){let revivedPosition=Position.revive(playerToRevive.playerType);let revivedPlayer=new DragAndDropPlayer(playerToRevive);revivedPlayer.setOnCourt(playerToRevive.onCourt);revivedPlayer.setNumber(playerToRevive.num);revivedPlayer.setServing(playerToRevive.serving);if(!isPlayerLink&&playerToRevive.playerLink!==undefined){revivedPlayer.setPlayerLink(this.reviveRecursive(playerToRevive.playerLink,true));}return revivedPlayer;}}
